title: HED polishes the Emporia GA Pro Silver Edition for a shiny, alloy gravel wheelset
content:
Looking to add a little pop to your gravel bike, without going crazy with colors? HED just added a new option for their Emporia GA Pro gravel wheels that will certainly stand out, while adding a touch of class to your build. Using their lightest alloy gravel wheelset as a starting point, the Emporia GA […]

The post HED polishes the Emporia GA Pro Silver Edition for a shiny, alloy gravel wheelset appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
